database.name: VIEW PBID_REQUISITIONLINE
database.view: SELECT a.m_requisitionline_id AS pbid_requisitionline_id, a.ad_client_id, a.ad_org_id, a.isactive, a.created, a.createdby, a.updated, a.updatedby, a.m_requisition_id, b.name AS productname FROM m_requisitionline a JOIN m_product b ON b.m_product_id = a.m_product_id
